comments.body: NumField will panic if typeValue.Kind() is not struct. I don't grok this enough to be sure that won't happen.

> NumField will panic if typeValue.Kind() is not struct. I don't grok this enough to be sure that won't happen.

It shouldn't happen, but I've added a guard to prevent the panic.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +127,131 @@	ret := make(map[string]reflect.Type)

	for fieldIndex := 0; fieldIndex < typeValue.NumField(); fieldIndex++ {
		fieldType := typeValue.Field(fieldIndex)
		yamlTag := fieldType.Tag.Get("json")
